name: NewZealandNHIIG
title: New Zealand NHI IG
description: The FHIRb  API for the NHI

resource.name: NHI Address
resource.description: Adds additional, NHI specific extensions

resource.name: NHI Patient
resource.description: The Patient resource exposed by the NHI.

resource.name: DepCentile
resource.description: Deprivation deciles are based on the Index of Multiple Deprivation 2015 (IMD15), which is the official measure of relative deprivation. Decile one represents the most deprived and decile 10 represents the least deprived

resource.name: DepQuintile
resource.description: A small-area-based index providing a measure of neighbourhood deprivation

resource.name: Informationsource
resource.description: The source of the information

resource.name: IsPrimaryAddress
resource.description: Indicates this is the primary residential address - each patient must have one and only one

resource.name: MeshBlock
resource.description: A meshblock is both a geographic unit and a classification. It is the smallest geographic unit for which statistical data is reported by Stats NZ. A meshblock is a defined geographic area, varying in size from part of a city block to large areas of rural land. Meshblocks are contiguous: each meshblock borders on another to form a network covering all of New Zealand, including coasts and inlets. The meshblock classification extends out to New Zealandâ€™s 200 mile exclusive economic zone (EEZ).

resource.description: The reason why the address has not been validated

resource.name: SAID
resource.description: Points to the id used buy the internal address coding. For use by advanced users only.

resource.name: Address Not Validated reason
resource.description: The reason why the address was not validated
